Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Three, two, one... Okay! You can open your eyes!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}
{3: 'Pulao moves her hands away from your eyes, and as you open them, colorful lights fill your vision, illuminating the night.'}
{3: "You have heard many vendors' shouts on your way, but seeing them in person still feels a bit unreal."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab'}
{2: 'A food street?', 3: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I promised a birthday surprise for you, Commandant, so tonight... I have rented out the whole street!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Commandant, grab whatever you want to eat. My wallet is right here! And don't worry about spending my money. I'm not a kid anymore!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well then, if you insist...', 3: '14', 4: "I can't accept this...", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Charge! Tonight, we stuff our birthday star before we return!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao enthusiastically pushes you, and you stumble and walk forward, smiling as you linger at each fragrant stall and colorful signboard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: "How about a grilled sausage? We're closing soon, so I can give you a 90% discount.", 4: '18'}
{2: "That's too good to be true.", 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Don't be surprised. A lot of food and ingredients can't be kept overnight, so shops often sell them at lower prices before closing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Here. Take it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A shiny grilled sausage is placed in your hand, the meaty aroma wafting into your nose, and you cannot help but feel a little hungry.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'It looks so delicious... Commandant, I want a bite too!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Offer the sausage)', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'That first bite goes to me, then, Commandant! Nom nom nom... Delicious!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao gives a thumbs-up, exhaling dramatically from the heat.'}
{2: 'Just eat slowly.', 3: '32'}
{1: '18', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Hey! You over there!', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Someone seems to be calling out for someone from behind. Turning around, you find a middle-aged man enthusiastically waving at you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Yes, you! I feel a connection with you. How about a free slice of Sachima?', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Hearing the call from the Sachima vendor, other stall owners also begin to beckon you despite how lost you look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Sugar people! Freshly-made sugar people! Hey, this one looks just like you! Here, take it!', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: 'Check out my shop! How about a glass of our new waxberry smoothie?', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vendor', 3: "Try a tanghulu! You're our... uh, thousandth customer! This one's on the house.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'You begin to have a strange suspicion that everything around you has been planned.'}
{2: 'Pulao? Is this your doing?', 3: '54'}
{3: 'You turn around, and the girl bouncing around just moments ago has vanished, along with a hawthorn tanghulu from the stall.'}
{3: 'Just as you begin to worry, the familiar figure pops up again in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Ta-da! The master chef is here! Look over here, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a beaming smile, Pulao runs toward you through the crowd, holding a wooden tray with a bowl of noodles.'}
{3: 'No mountains or oceans can stop the energetic girl. She seems to part the crowd effortlessly.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Happy birthday, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'These longevity noodles were handmade by me. I learned it from Uncle Li at the noodle shop.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I was worried you'd figure out my plan early, so I had everyone help keep you busy... Alright! Try it quickly before it gets cold!", 4: '1'}
{3: "You take a bite under Pulao's expectant gaze. The broth is delicious, the noodles perfectly chewy, and her effort is evident in every bite."}
{3: "Hearing your praise, Pulao's smile grows even wider."}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I'm glad you like it! People say eating longevity noodles on birthdays ensures a long and healthy life.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'By the way, have you made any birthday wishes today? Can you make one more?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "How about... wishing that you can celebrate every birthday with Pulao? That's it!", 4: '1'}
